input_text: Pt: 45yo F. c/o migraine. Photophobia +. Rx: Sumatriptan 100mg prn.
output_text: The patient is a 45-year-old female reporting a migraine headache. She is sensitive to light. She has been prescribed Sumatriptan 100mg to take when needed.

input_text: Dx: Acute bronchitis. Lungs clear bilat. No fever. Tx: Albuterol MDI q4h prn cough.
output_text: You have been diagnosed with acute bronchitis. Your lungs sound clear on both sides and you do not have a fever. Please use your Albuterol inhaler every 4 hours if you need it for your cough.

input_text: HPI: 10y M. Fall on arm. Xray: distal radius fx. Cast applied. f/u ortho 1wk.
output_text: History of present illness: 10-year-old male fell on his arm. X-ray shows a break in the wrist bone. A cast was put on. Please follow up with the orthopedist in one week.

input_text: Subj: Sore throat x3d. Obj: Erythema post pharynx. Neg strep. Plan: Salt water gargles.
output_text: Subjective: Sore throat for 3 days. Objective: Redness in the back of the throat. Strep test was negative. Plan: Gargle with salt water to help soothe the pain.

input_text: Pt hx HTN. BP 150/95. Meds adjusted: Lisinopril inc to 20mg daily.
output_text: The patient has a history of high blood pressure. Current blood pressure is 150/95. Medication has been changed: Lisinopril dose is increased to 20mg once a day.
